test_case.title: Visibility and Flashing of Text Cursor in Search Field
pre_condition: The user has any Mac device with macOS 11 (Big Sur), macOS 12 (Monterey), macOS 13 (Ventura), or macOS 14 (Sonoma) with a functioning Spotlight Search.

steps.action: After opening Spotlight Search, observe that the text cursor is visible and flashing on the left side of the search field.
steps.expected_result: The text cursor is visibly flashing on the left side of the search field.
